{/* Logo */}

    {[ { path: '/', label: 'Home' }, { path: '/event', label: 'Event Details' }, { path: '/rsvp', label: 'RSVP' }, { path: '/board', label: 'Board Members' }, ].map(({ path, label }) => (
  • `px-3 sm:px-4 py-2 rounded-full transition duration-300 ${ isActive ? 'bg-primary text-white' : 'text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-200' }` } > {label}

); }; export default Header;
